__Request for Whaley Law Firm Review__
Cc: [morganfreemanz3537518@louisvilleaccidentlawyer.filevineapp.com](mailto:morganfreemanz3537518@louisvilleaccidentlawyer.filevineapp.com)
Dear Morgan,
I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to reach out and ask for your help in reviewing our personal injury law firm,  Whaley Law Firm. We value your feedback and your experience with our firm, and we'd be honored if you could share your thoughts with others who may be in need of legal assistance.
If you could take just a few minutes to leave a review on our Google My Business page or on our Facebook page, it would mean the world to us. Your review will help us continue to provide the best possible service to our clients and to help others make informed decisions when choosing a personal injury lawyer.
If you're not sure how to leave a review, I've included some quick instructions below:
 GOOGLE:
Click on this link:
https://g.page/r/CUXu060FaTnWEB0/review
If you are logged into Gmail or Google then it will take you directly to the review. If not you will be asked to log in and then go to the review.
Facebook:
Click on this link:
https://www.facebook.com/TheWhaleyLawFirm/reviews
You will be asked to log in if not already and then you can leave a review!
I hope we have earned a 5 Star Review!
Thank you so much for taking the time to consider our Request. We truly appreciate your support and your business.
Best regards,
Aaron Whaley
Whaley Law Firm
Sent from Mail for Windows
